tool.name: Principal Component Analysis
tool.description: Principal Component Analysis (PCA) for grids. PCA implementation is based on F.Murtagh's code as provided by the StatLib web site.

param.name: EIGEN_INPUT
param.label: Eigen Vectors
param.help: Use Eigen vectors from this table instead of calculating these from the input grids.

param.name: COMPONENTS
param.label: Number of Components
param.help: number of first components in the output; set to zero to get all
